textBox.richText: I have officially arrived at the heartland - Nerd Mecca. On Thursday night Apple handed out a behind the scenes look at their campus. Not just a lame guided tour - a campus bash. This was a crazy party. BT hooked up the tunes, Heineken looked after the suds and Taco Bell catered the grub. I’ve added a few new photos to the end of the WWDC photo gallery here. This has been the highlight of the trip so far. Check out the cheesy grin in the pic above! Can you tell how psyched I am? :)
